entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
